hangle: 차라리 어둠의 존재 자체를 없앨 방법은 없는 건가요?
first_translate: is there no way  we can eliminate darkness itself instead?

hangle: 오, 클로비스 후작님과 똑같은 말씀을 하시는군요.
first_translate: that’s exactly what marquess clovis said as well.

hangle: 아카데미에 가장 많은 연구비를 후원해 주시는 분이죠.
first_translate: he's our biggest sponsor for research at the academy.
and someone who understands how important this work is.
it goes without saying that we’re grateful for his support.
I think he’s quite impressive too... outside of all those things.
to hear that she was working on her own like that...

hangle: 역시 아렌트는 의심스럽긴 해도 대단한 인물이긴 해.
first_translate: suspicions aside, aren’t you amazing, arendt?

hangle: 저희도 어둠을 없애는 걸 목표로 연구를 진행 중 입니다만…
first_translate: we’ve been researching ways to get rid of darkness ourselves...
but haven’t had much success so far.
all we found out was that magic power, darkness, and divine powers held by saints...

hangle: 전부 유기적인 관계가 있다는 걸 알아내기는 했지만요.

first_translate: divine powers are completely opposite from magical ones.

hangle: 그리고 마력은 근본적으로 어둠과 유사한 성질.
first_translate: magic has similar properties to darkness fundamentally speaking.

hangle: 또한 마력과 마력석은 서로 상호작용을 하죠.
first_translate: on top of that, mana stones interact with each other.

hangle: 그러니 그쪽을 연구하면 뭔가 답이 나올지도 몰라요.
first_translate: studying them might give us some answers.
you seem very knowledgeable about these matters.

hangle: 관심 분야가 비슷한 분을 만나게 되어 기뻐요.
first_translate: I’m glad to meet someone interested in the same field.
my name is jane. please call me by my first name.

hangle: 헤일론은 마물의 습격이 잦아 자연히 이쪽에 관심이 생겼답니다. 잘 부탁드려요.
first_translate: the frequent monster attacks back home led me to become more interested in this area myself. nice meeting you.

hangle: 헤일론 영애, 이걸 안 물을 수가 없는데요.
first_translate: lady haelion, may I ask something?

hangle: 영애께서는 어둠이 최근에 활발해진 이유가 뭐라고 생각하시나요?
first_translate: what do you believe caused the recent increase in dark forces?
even I am curious about that...

hangle: 이 세계의 사람들은 어둠을 자연재해와 비슷하게 생각한다.
first_translate: darkness is considered somewhat akin to a natural disaster here.

hangle: 일 년에 한두 번 강한 태풍이 오면 일대가 엉망이 되어버리지만,
first_translate: a strong typhoon will destroy everything once or twice every year,

hangle: 죽은 땅도 긴 시간이 지나면 어느 정도 회복된다.
first_translate: but even barren lands recover over time.

hangle: 하지만 최근 어둠의 등장이 잦아져 다들 위기의식을 느낀 거겠지.
first_translate: recently though, people have started panicking because of its increased frequency.

hangle: 제인처럼 어둠이 기승을 부리는 이유가 궁금한 사람이 많을 거다.
first_translate: like professor jane, many must wonder why darkness is becoming stronger.

hangle: 근래 어둠이 자주 나타나게 된 건

first_translate: ...is definitely due to god being angry.
...is definitely due to god being angry.

hangle: 듣자 하니 관련된 종교도 생겼다는 모양이에요.
first_translate: apparently, they've formed their own religion now.
your holiness, welcome to northern balrok village.

hangle: 숲과 마을… 어느 쪽을 먼저 정화하는 게 좋을까요?
first_translate: where would you prefer to purify first, the forest or the town?
let’s start with the forest then.
did I write anything like this before?
could all this truly be happening...

hangle: 정말로 신이 화가 난 탓에 일어난 걸까?
애초에 신이란 건 있는지 없는지도 모르는걸.
first_translate: nobody knows if gods exist anyway.

hangle: 조사 끝나고 돌아올 때는 무언가 복잡한 얼굴이었다가,
first_translate: when you came back after your investigation, you looked troubled.
as soon as you saw me, you stared at me blankly...
...and changed into that smirking face just now.

hangle: 똥개 중에서 가장 잘생긴 똥개라고 생각하니 그만.
first_translate: stop thinking you’re the most handsome dog around.
is there something on my face?

hangle: 겨울의 수호자라길래, 처음에는 몸집이 태산만 한 사람일 거라 생각했거든…
first_translate: at first, when I heard winter guardian, I thought you’d be huge...
there isn’t anyone else as special--

hangle: 어둠이 같은 곳에 두 번 올 수도 있나?
first_translate: can darkness appear in the same place twice?
get on horseback and move fast!

hangle: 엑스트라 기사들은 비전투 인원에게 최대한 붙는다!
first_translate: extra knights stay close to non-combatants!
tell him to watch himself if you see him!
please tell me you don’t plan on staying behind.
make sure to take cover in the woods right away, my lady.

hangle: 위험한 상황에서 윗대가리가 가장 먼저 내빼면,
first_translate: if leaders run off during dangerous situations,

hangle: 공작한테 부탁을 받은 게 있어서 말이다.
first_translate: I made a promise to duke bernhart.
“if my daughter runs foolishly toward danger,
save her using any method possible.”
I’ll make sure everyone returns safely!
